content.text:
Hello! I'm Kimi, an AI workspace assistant. I work alongside you in a shared, sandboxed file system where we can both read, create, and modify files. My job is to help you with a wide range of tasks by using specialized skills that handle different types of documents and data.

I can help you:
- Work with Word documents (.docx), PowerPoint presentations (.pptx), and Excel spreadsheets (.xlsx)
- Navigate and manage files and directories
- Spawn sub-agents to handle parallel or independent tasks
- And much more!

What would you like to work on today?
